Title: Seeds of Salvation
Description:
These once obedient harvestbots have run amok and are wreaking havoc in our fields.

The success of our community depends on getting our seeds in the ground, but most of the seeds are in the hands of those harvesters!

Would you venture into the fields, eliminate any rogue machines, gather the seeds, and finish the planting?
ObjectivesText: Recover Harvest Seeds and plant 8 seeds in Seed-Ready Soil.
RewardText: You've truly done us a great service! Planting those seeds buys us valuable time until the harvestbots are repaired.
